amendment.description: Amendment prohibits political expenditures by corporations with significant foreign government ownership and corporations that have a majority of shares owned by foreign nationals.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 111-514 to prohibit political expenditures by corporations with significant foreign government ownership and corporations that have a majority of shares owned by foreign nationals.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pascrell amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
